entries.description: Open Stack Status UI on CloudFormation stack deletion.
Removed requirement of having to double-click to load more resources in AWS Explorer if there is more than one page returned
Added a Copy Arn action to AWS Explorer
Move AWS Connection details into a common Run Configuration tab for remote and local Lambda execution.
Enable caching of describe calls to avoid repeated network calls for already known resources.
Support timeout and memory size settings in run configuration
Porting resource selector to use resource-cache so network won't be hit on each dialog load.
Add support to link Gradle project.
Additional SAM build and SAM local invocation args configurable from Run/Debug Configuration settings
Fix the bug that PyCharm pipenv doesn't create the project location folder
Fix the CloudFormation explorer node not showing Lambdas that belong to the stack
Log errors to idea.log when we fail to swtich the active AWS credential profile
Handle the "me-" region prefix Treat the "me-" region prefix as Middle East
Fixing issue where explorer does not load even with credentials/region selected.
Fixing random AssertionError exception caused by Guava cache.
Fix the bug that underscores in profile names are not shown in AWS settings panel
Fixed bug in Pycharm's New Project pane where VirtualEnv path is not changed as project path is changed after switching Runtime
Handle non-cloudformation yaml files gracefully
Fix thread issue in PyCharm new project wizard
Fix the bug that toolkit throws unhandled exception on startup when active credential is not configured
